text:
The tar file available for distribution for apache_1.3.27, although named
apache_1.3.27.tar.gz is not in gzip format (raw .tar format) and the md5sum does
not match.  Has it been hacked?
creator: owen@uiuc.edu

text:
my first guess is that your browser has ungzipped the file for you.
mozilla did/does this.

in the future all security issues should be mailed to security@apache.org
creator: ianh@apache.org
slive@apache.org
text:
I just verified the integrity of the files using md5 on the server.  So this
is almost certainly a browser usage issue.

*blush*

This is the first time I've had this happen with this browser, but wget
gets things correctly.  Sorry to have bothered everyone.
creator: owen@uiuc.edu
